item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome to the book From 0 to buffer overflow. This book will teach you how to hack remotely a computer using memory corruption vulnerabilities. You will learn computer science about reverse engineering (dissect obscure computers and programs), vulnerability exploitation (code to break existing programs and remotely take over a computer) and cryptanalysis (cryptanalysis is a branch of the mathenmatics made to attack cryptography. Cryptography is math about to defend information.
